events.message: The candidate has submitted their application for the software engineer role, detailing strong experience in backend development and cloud services.
Application reviewed and categorized under Engineering based on keywords such as software engineer, backend development, and cloud infrastructure.
Recruiter Jane Smith assigned to handle the candidate's application and coordinate further screening and interviews.
Phone screening completed successfully, with candidate demonstrating solid understanding of distributed systems and strong problem-solving skills.
Candidate responded promptly and positively to the screening feedback and confirmed availability for the technical interview next week.
Technical interview scheduled for May 8th at 15:00 UTC with the senior engineering team to assess coding skills and system design abilities.
